function.name: get_epic_free_games_for_epic_free_games
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "epic_free_games", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "get_epic_free_games_for_epic_free_games"

function.name: get_all_stored_categories_for_taboo_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "taboo_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get a list of all stored categories. Use them to get results for the specified category"

function.name: get_taboo_words_from_word_for_taboo_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "taboo_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Provide your own word and get the taboo words back.

Optionally pass a parameter which will control the amount of taboo words to be returned, "forbiddenWordLimit" defaults to 4 and has a max of 10"

function.name: get_result_from_category_for_taboo_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "taboo_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Given a stored category, get a random result which will contain the main phrase and the taboo words.

Optionally pass a parameter which will control the amount of taboo words to be returned, "forbiddenWordLimit" defaults to 4 and has a max of 10"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I want to make it extra special. Can you suggest some epic free games that we can play during the party? Also, find some giveaways related to gaming that I can include as gifts for the guests. Additionally, provide me with the recent matchmaking matches in Trackmania to add a competitive element to the party.
